name: Cyclopentadienyl anion
desc: In chemistry, the cyclopentadienyl anion or cyclopentadienide is an aromatic species with a formula of [C5H5]− and abbreviated as Cp−. Its name derives from the molecule cyclopentadiene. Salts of the cyclopentadienyl anion can be stable, e.g., sodium cyclopentadienide. more complex coordination compounds are known as cyclopentadienyl complexes, such as metallocene
